title: Map, "Green Map Uji Eco Community Map vol. 01 2008 Spring", 2008
medium: Printed with soy inks on white paper, folded
dimensions: Sheet: 21.1 x 7.5 cm (8 5/16 x 2 15/16 in.), folded
creditline: Gift of Wendy Brawer, Green Map System
description: Recto titled: Green Map Uji / eco community map / vol. 01 2008 SPRING.  When map is unfolded, this title appears at upper left corner of map.  Map text written in Japanese with occasional location identifiers, telephone numbers written in Arabic numerals. Selected text written in English.  Verso titled: eco community / Green Map Uji News Letter / 01.  Text on this side arranged in columns, written in Japanese. Small tear at left center edge of sheet.

tombstone.epitaph: Map, "Green Map Uji Eco Community Map vol. 01 2008 Spring", 2008. Printed with soy inks on white paper, folded. Gift of Wendy Brawer, Green Map System. 2011-46-2.
